/* LogSendMapper.getPosList */
SELECT tmp.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM, tmp.STORE_CD, tmp.STORE_NM, tmp.POS_NO, tmp.POS_VER_NO, tmp.SYS_STAT_FG, tmp.DB_SEND_YN
FROM TB_HQ_OFFICE tho, (SELECT tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tmp.POS_NO, tmp.POS_VER_NO, tms.SYS_STAT_FG, (CASE WHEN tmp.DB_SEND_YN IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE tmp.DB_SEND_YN END) AS DB_SEND_YN FROM TB_MS_POS tmp, TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tms.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD) tmp WHERE tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tmp.HQ_OFFICE_CD
AND tmp.HQ_OFFICE_CD LIKE '%' || #{hqOfficeCd} || '%'
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%' || #{hqOfficeNm} || '%'
AND tmp.STORE_CD LIKE '%' || #{storeCd} || '%'
AND tmp.STORE_NM LIKE '%' || #{storeNm} || '%'
AND tmp.SYS_STAT_FG = #{sysStatFg}
ORDER BY tmp.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tmp.STORE_CD, tmp.POS_NO
